Title: Testing Account Activity on Xiaohongshu
Content: To test whether your Xiaohongshu account is functioning normally, you can publish an interactive post and monitor its basic view count. A healthy account should have a basic view count of at least 50, with 200 being ideal. For example, you can create a simple post with a white background and some text asking for comments on a specific topic, such as 'Looking for shoes that can be worn outside.' High interaction in the comments section indicates that your account is active and engaging. This method helps you gauge the baseline activity of your account and ensures that it is ready for regular use.

Title: Creating an Interactive Post
Content: Creating an interactive post on Xiaohongshu involves a few simple steps. First, prepare a white background image. You can use an app like Meitu Xiuxiu for this purpose. Open the app, select 'Photo Beautification,' and choose your white background image. Adjust the image to a 4:3 ratio, which is the standard for Xiaohongshu. Next, use the graffiti pen tool to write your interactive question or statement on the image. For instance, you could write 'Looking for shoes that can be worn outside.' Save the image once you are satisfied with the text. This type of post is designed to encourage user interaction, making it an effective way to test your account's engagement levels.

Title: Publishing the Interactive Post
Content: To publish your interactive post on Xiaohongshu, follow these steps. First, open the Xiaohongshu app and click the '+' button to create a new post. Select the image you prepared earlier and click 'Next.' Paste the pre-written title and content into the respective fields. For example, your title could be 'Looking for shoes that can be worn outside,' and the content can be a brief description or question to encourage comments. Once you have pasted the title and content, click 'Publish.' This method ensures that your post is engaging and encourages interaction from your followers, helping you test the activity level of your account effectively.
